title: Heft Webpack configuration
description: Defines the heft configuration for Webpack

$schema.description: Part of the JSON Schema standard, this optional keyword declares the URL of the schema that the file conforms to. Editors may download the schema and use it to perform syntax highlighting.

webpackConfigFilePath.description: A path to a Webpack configuration JS file. If this isn't specified, and a Webpack configuration isn't specified via another plugin, Webpack won't be run.

webpackServeConfigFilePath.description: A path to a Webpack configuration JS file, specifically to be used in --serve mode. If this and webpackConfigFilePath aren't specified, and a Webpack configuration isn't specified via another plugin, Webpack won't be run in --serve mode.
